label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_021
content:

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones off-peak; clean transfer stats and improved propagation P95 relative to peak-window attempts.
- Enabled prefetch for 2 more resolver POPs (82% coverage); cache hit rate improved slightly.
- Executed bulk update of CAA and DMARC TXT records across 9 zones; ensured record-set size constraints respected via pre-check.
- Reviewed DNSSEC signature validity window parameters; confirmed uniform policy across signed zones.

### On Call
- Shift: F. Delgado
- Pages: 0
- Tickets: 6
- Status: Normal; off-peak migrations proceeding smoothly with improved cache performance.
